description.translate: I am not afraid of cruelty	or gratuitous violence.

items.nbt: {display:{Name:"\"§9Iconoclaste\"","Lore":["{\"text\":\"§7Je n'ai pas peur de la cruauté\"}","{\"text\":\"§7ni de la violence gratuite.\"}","{\"text\":\"§7I am not afraid of cruelty\"}","{\"text\":\"§7or gratuitous violence.\"}","{\"text\":\"§7STR§a2 §7HAS§a1 §7SPD§c-1 §7LUC§c-1\"}"]}}
